metadata.name: Genesis Vessel - 1
metadata.description: The basketball is a Vessel: A Vessel for creativity, a Vessel for community, a Vessel for innovation. Introducing the Vessel: a basketball inspired generative art digital collectible that celebrates the sport's icon as an adaptable and imaginative totem to connect an eclectic group of ambitious fans. 450 Genesis Vessels were made available for early VesselVerse members and carry unique governance superpowers to enable OGs ability to contribute and steer VesselVerse direction.
